txt.en: 'SPEAK WITH MY COMPANION TBD'
Ancient Ruins of the Limlight
You have discovered Ancient Elf-ruins
A few Ancient stones remain here among the rocks. It is hard to say, but they may be of Elf-make.
You have discovered Mysterious Elf-ruins
The few remaining chunks of masonry and stonework you found suggest that the Elves once lived here...but it must have been an age of the world at least since that time.
You have discovered Tumbled Elf-ruins
Covered with ancient lichens, you find the final crumbling remnants of an Elf-ruin. What purpose could the Elves have had so long ago that brought them here?
Look for traces of the ancient legacy of the Limlight Gorge, when it was still a part of the Golden Wood ages ago.
You have discovered Hallowed Elf-ruins
These ruins look even older than the rest, if that is possible. You cannot even begin to guess at what their purpose might have been.
Speak with the emissaries from Lothlorien in the Ent Grove TBD
You have discovered Engraved Elf-ruins

These old Elf-ruins appear to have some strange markings carved upon them. You have some considerable difficulty deciphering the odd runes, until finally you realize that they are rather recent additions, likely made by Men or dwarves surveying the Gorge long after the structure fell to ruin.
Speak with the Ordhrien in the Ent Grove TBD
You have discovered Crumbling Elf-ruins
These ruins are so ancient that there is no sign of what brought them to this state, whether it was war, calamity, or the passing of some vast span of time that crumbled them to all but nothing.
